name: The Maze (FoulardPigeon)
description:
"The Maze" is my main project I presented at my Artistic Diploma. That's why it's more an Interactive experience than a real video game.

In this game, players are surrounded by darkness. They will want to find a light source to locate themselves. Eventually they will find the "holy" light, the one which enlightened everything.

You are force to move forward but you have the freedom to choose to move right or left by clicking black buttons below he screen.
